choices.E: Neutron is the networking component that is used to create and manage network resources.
choices.B: Keystone is the networking component that is used to create and manage network resources.
choices.C: Nova is the compute component that is used to manage and automate the provisioning of compute resources.
choices.D: Horizon is the component that is used for IP address management.
choices.A: Trove is the GUI web application that is used to control and configure different OpenStack components.

questions.question_text: Which two statements about OpenStack are true? (Choose two.)

comments.content: Well, you made me changed my mind from the switch being in end host mode to switch mode. I agree. DE.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. Which two options can be determined by the Cisco UCS environment? (Choose two.)

choices.A: Five FCoE attached servers are on the FI.
choices.B: The Cisco UCS is in end-host mode.
choices.D: The Cisco UCS is in FC switch mode.
choices.E: Three FCoE attached server are on the FI.
choices.C: Seven FCoE attached servers are on the FI.

discussion.content: Port mode is vntag, means some sort of FEX. The only possible option here is an IOM in a Blade-Chassis with B-Series servers. This will also support FCoE.

choices.B: The device is a C-Series server.
choices.E: The device is a B-Series server. AE

discussion.content:
vPC Considerations for VXLAN BGP EVPN Deployment
The loopback address used by NVE needs to be configured to have a primary IP address and a secondary IP address.
vPC peers must have identical configurations.
Consistent VLAN to VN-segment mapping.
Consistent NVE1 binding to the same loopback interface
Using the same secondary IP address
Using different primary IP addresses.
Consistent VNI to group mapping.

Each vPC peer needs to have separate BGP sessions to the spine.

vPC peers must have identical configurations.

Consistent VLAN to VN-segment mapping.

Consistent NVE1 binding to the same loopback interface

Using the same secondary IP address.

Using different primary IP addresses.

Consistent VNI to group mapping.

The VRF overlay VLAN should be a member of the peer-link port-channel.

questions.question_text: Which three configurations can be different between EVPN vPC peers? (Choose three.)

choices.D: using a different secondary IP address
choices.A: using the same primary IP addresses
choices.C: consistent NVE1 binding to the same loopback interface
